though. "A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program," says an article on MSPmentor.net, which tracks the managed services provider market. MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers.
